actions.name: AddRoleToDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role from an Aurora DB cluster

actions.name: AddRoleToDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role with a DB instance

actions.name: AddSourceIdentifierToSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to add a source identifier to an existing RDS event notification subscription

actions.name: AddTagsToResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add metadata tags to an Amazon RDS resource

actions.name: ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction
actions.description: Grants permission to apply a pending maintenance action to a resource

actions.name: AuthorizeDBSecurityGroupIngress
actions.description: Grants permission to enable ingress to a DBSecurityGroup using one of two forms of authorization

actions.name: BacktrackDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to backtrack a DB cluster to a specific time, without creating a new DB cluster

actions.name: CancelExportTask
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel an export task in progress

actions.name: CopyCustomDBEngineVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to copy a custom engine version

actions.name: CopyDBClusterParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to copy the specified DB cluster parameter group

actions.name: CopyDBClusterSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot of a DB cluster

actions.name: CopyDBParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to copy the specified DB parameter group

actions.name: CopyDBSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to copy the specified DB snapshot

actions.name: CopyOptionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to copy the specified option group

actions.name: CreateBlueGreenDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a blue-green deployment for a given source cluster or instance

actions.name: CreateCustomDBEngineVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a custom engine version

actions.name: CreateDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB cluster

actions.name: CreateDBClusterEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new custom endpoint and associates it with an Amazon Aurora DB cluster or Amazon DocumentDB cluster

actions.name: CreateDBClusterParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB cluster parameter group

actions.name: CreateDBClusterSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot of a DB cluster

actions.name: CreateDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB instance

actions.name: CreateDBInstanceReadReplica
actions.description: Grants permission to create a DB instance that acts as a Read Replica of a source DB instance

actions.name: CreateDBParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB parameter group

actions.name: CreateDBProxy
actions.description: Grants permission to create a database proxy

actions.name: CreateDBProxyEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create a database proxy endpoint

actions.name: CreateDBSecurityGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB security group. DB security groups control access to a DB instance

actions.name: CreateDBShardGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Aurora Limitless Database DB shard group

actions.name: CreateDBSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a DBSnapshot

actions.name: CreateDBSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB subnet group

actions.name: CreateEventSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to create an RDS event notification subscription

actions.name: CreateGlobalCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Aurora global database or DocumentDB global database spread across multiple regions

actions.name: CreateIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Aurora zero-ETL integration with Redshift

actions.name: CreateOptionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new option group

actions.name: CreateTenantDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new tenant database

actions.name: CrossRegionCommunication
actions.description: Grants permission to access a resource in the remote Region when executing cross-Region operations, such as cross-Region snapshot copy or cross-Region read replica creation

actions.name: DeleteBlueGreenDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete blue green deployments

actions.name: DeleteCustomDBEngineVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing custom engine version

actions.name: DeleteDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned DB cluster

actions.name: DeleteDBClusterAutomatedBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete cluster automated backups based on the source cluster's DbClusterResourceId value or the restorable cluster's resource ID

actions.name: DeleteDBClusterEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom endpoint and removes it from an Amazon Aurora DB cluster or Amazon DocumentDB cluster

actions.name: DeleteDBClusterParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified DB cluster parameter group

actions.name: DeleteDBClusterSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a DB cluster snapshot

actions.name: DeleteDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned DB instance

actions.name: DeleteDBInstanceAutomatedBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete automated backups based on the source instance's DbiResourceId value or the restorable instance's resource ID

actions.name: DeleteDBParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified DBParameterGroup

actions.name: DeleteDBProxy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a database proxy

actions.name: DeleteDBProxyEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a database proxy endpoint

actions.name: DeleteDBSecurityGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a DB security group

actions.name: DeleteDBShardGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Aurora Limitless Database DB shard group

actions.name: DeleteDBSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a DBSnapshot

actions.name: DeleteDBSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a DB subnet group

actions.name: DeleteEventSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an RDS event notification subscription

actions.name: DeleteGlobalCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a global database cluster

actions.name: DeleteIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Aurora zero-ETL integration with Redshift

actions.name: DeleteOptionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing option group

actions.name: DeleteTenantDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a tenant database

actions.name: DeregisterDBProxyTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to remove targets from a database proxy target group

actions.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the attributes for a customer account

actions.name: DescribeBlueGreenDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to describe blue green deployments

actions.name: DescribeCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to list the set of CA certificates provided by Amazon RDS for this AWS account

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterAutomatedBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of cluster automated backups for both current and deleted clusters

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about backtracks for a DB cluster

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about endpoints for an Amazon Aurora DB cluster

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterParameterGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBClusterParameterGroup descriptions

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to return the detailed parameter list for a particular DB cluster parameter group

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterSnapshotAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DB cluster snapshot attribute names and values for a manual DB cluster snapshot

actions.name: DescribeDBClusterSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about DB cluster snapshots

actions.name: DescribeDBClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about provisioned Aurora DB clusters or DocumentDB clusters

actions.name: DescribeDBEngineVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the available DB engines

actions.name: DescribeDBInstanceAutomatedBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of automated backups for both current and deleted instances

actions.name: DescribeDBInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about provisioned RDS instances

actions.name: DescribeDBLogFiles
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DB log files for the DB instance

actions.name: DescribeDBParameterGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBParameterGroup descriptions

actions.name: DescribeDBParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to return the detailed parameter list for a particular DB parameter group

actions.name: DescribeDBProxies
actions.description: Grants permission to view proxies

actions.name: DescribeDBProxyEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to view proxy endpoints

actions.name: DescribeDBProxyTargetGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to view database proxy target group details

actions.name: DescribeDBProxyTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to view database proxy target details

actions.name: DescribeDBRecommendations
actions.description: Grants permission to list recommendation details

actions.name: DescribeDBSecurityGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBSecurityGroup descriptions

actions.name: DescribeDBShardGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about all Aurora Limitless Database DB shard groups for this account. You can filter by shard group(s)

actions.name: DescribeDBSnapshotAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DB snapshot attribute names and values for a manual DB snapshot

actions.name: DescribeDBSnapshotTenantDatabases
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about tenant databases in DB snapshots. You can filter by Region or snapshot

actions.name: DescribeDBSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about DB snapshots

actions.name: DescribeDBSubnetGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBSubnetGroup descriptions

actions.name: DescribeEngineDefaultClusterParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to return the default engine and system parameter information for the cluster database engine

actions.name: DescribeEngineDefaultParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to return the default engine and system parameter information for the specified database engine

actions.name: DescribeEventCategories
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of categories for all event source types, or, if specified, for a specified source type

actions.name: DescribeEventSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the subscription descriptions for a customer account

actions.name: DescribeEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to return events related to DB instances, DB security groups, DB snapshots, and DB parameter groups for the past 14 days

actions.name: DescribeExportTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the export tasks

actions.name: DescribeGlobalClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about Aurora global database clusters or DocumentDB global database clusters

actions.name: DescribeIntegrations
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an Aurora zero-ETL integration with Redshift

actions.name: DescribeOptionGroupOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all available options

actions.name: DescribeOptionGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the available option groups

actions.name: DescribeOrderableDBInstanceOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of orderable DB instance options for the specified engine

actions.name: DescribePendingMaintenanceActions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of resources (for example, DB instances) that have at least one pending maintenance action

actions.name: DescribeRecommendationGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about recommendation groups

actions.name: DescribeRecommendations
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about recommendations

actions.name: DescribeReservedDBInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about reserved DB instances for this account, or about a specified reserved DB instance

actions.name: DescribeReservedDBInstancesOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to list available reserved DB instance offerings

actions.name: DescribeSourceRegions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the source AWS Regions where the current AWS Region can create a Read Replica or copy a DB snapshot from

actions.name: DescribeTenantDatabases
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about provisioned tenant databases. You can filter by Region or snapshot

actions.name: DescribeValidDBInstanceModifications
actions.description: Grants permission to list available modifications you can make to your DB instance

actions.name: DisableHttpEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to disable http endpoint for a DB cluster

actions.name: DownloadCompleteDBLogFile
actions.description: Grants permission to download specified log file

actions.name: DownloadDBLogFilePortion
actions.description: Grants permission to download all or a portion of the specified log file, up to 1 MB in size

actions.name: EnableHttpEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to enable http endpoint for a DB cluster

actions.name: FailoverDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to force a failover for a DB cluster

actions.name: FailoverGlobalCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to failover a global cluster

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Amazon RDS resource

actions.name: ModifyActivityStream
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a database activity stream

actions.name: ModifyCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the system-default Secure Sockets Layer/Transport Layer Security (SSL/TLS) certificate for Amazon RDS for new DB instances

actions.name: ModifyCurrentDBClusterCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to modify current cluster capacity for an Amazon Aurora Serverless DB cluster

actions.name: ModifyCustomDBEngineVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing custom engine version

actions.name: ModifyDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a setting for an Amazon Aurora DB cluster or Amazon DocumentDB cluster

actions.name: ModifyDBClusterEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of an endpoint in an Amazon Aurora DB cluster or Amazon DocumentDB cluster

actions.name: ModifyDBClusterParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB cluster parameter group

actions.name: ModifyDBClusterSnapshotAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to add an attribute and values to, or removes an attribute and values from, a manual DB cluster snapshot

actions.name: ModifyDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to modify settings for a DB instance

actions.name: ModifyDBParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB parameter group

actions.name: ModifyDBProxy
actions.description: Grants permission to modify database proxy

actions.name: ModifyDBProxyEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to modify database proxy endpoint

actions.name: ModifyDBProxyTargetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify target group for a database proxy

actions.name: ModifyDBRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to modify recommendation

actions.name: ModifyDBShardGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify properties of an Aurora Limitless Database DB shard group

actions.name: ModifyDBSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to update a manual DB snapshot, which can be encrypted or not encrypted, with a new engine version

actions.name: ModifyDBSnapshotAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to add an attribute and values to, or removes an attribute and values from, a manual DB snapshot

actions.name: ModifyDBSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing DB subnet group

actions.name: ModifyEventSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing RDS event notification subscription

actions.name: ModifyGlobalCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a setting for an Amazon Aurora global cluster or Amazon DocumentDB global cluster

actions.name: ModifyIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an Aurora zero-ETL integration with Redshift

actions.name: ModifyOptionGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing option group

actions.name: ModifyRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to modify recommendation

actions.name: ModifyTenantDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a tenant database

actions.name: PromoteReadReplica
actions.description: Grants permission to promote a Read Replica DB instance to a standalone DB instance

actions.name: PromoteReadReplicaDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to promote a Read Replica DB cluster to a standalone DB cluster

actions.name: PurchaseReservedDBInstancesOffering
actions.description: Grants permission to purchase a reserved DB instance offering

actions.name: RebootDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot a previously provisioned DB cluster

actions.name: RebootDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to restart the database engine service

actions.name: RebootDBShardGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot an Aurora Limitless Database DB shard group

actions.name: RegisterDBProxyTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to add targets to a database proxy target group

actions.name: RemoveFromGlobalCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to detach an Aurora secondary cluster from an Aurora global database cluster or DocumentDB global cluster

actions.name: RemoveRoleFromDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role from an Amazon Aurora DB cluster

actions.name: RemoveRoleFromDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role from a DB instance

actions.name: RemoveSourceIdentifierFromSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a source identifier from an existing RDS event notification subscription

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove metadata tags from an Amazon RDS resource

actions.name: ResetDBClusterParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB cluster parameter group to the default value

actions.name: ResetDBParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB parameter group to the engine/system default value

actions.name: RestoreDBClusterFromS3
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Aurora DB cluster from data stored in an Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: RestoreDBClusterFromSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB cluster from a DB cluster snapshot

actions.name: RestoreDBClusterToPointInTime
actions.description: Grants permission to restore a DB cluster to an arbitrary point in time

actions.name: RestoreDBInstanceFromDBSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB instance from a DB snapshot

actions.name: RestoreDBInstanceFromS3
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new DB instance from an Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: RestoreDBInstanceToPointInTime
actions.description: Grants permission to restore a DB instance to an arbitrary point in time

actions.name: RevokeDBSecurityGroupIngress
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke ingress from a DBSecurityGroup for previously authorized IP ranges or EC2 or VPC Security Groups

actions.name: StartActivityStream
actions.description: Grants permission to start Activity Stream

actions.name: StartDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to start the DB cluster

actions.name: StartDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to start the DB instance

actions.name: StartDBInstanceAutomatedBackupsReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to start replication of automated backups to a different AWS Region

actions.name: StartExportTask
actions.description: Grants permission to start a new Export task for a DB snapshot

actions.name: StopActivityStream
actions.description: Grants permission to stop Activity Stream

actions.name: StopDBCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the DB cluster

actions.name: StopDBInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the DB instance

actions.name: StopDBInstanceAutomatedBackupsReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to stop automated backup replication for a DB instance

actions.name: SwitchoverBlueGreenDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to switch a blue-green deployment from source instance or cluster to target

actions.name: SwitchoverGlobalCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to switchover a global cluster

actions.name: SwitchoverReadReplica
actions.description: Grants permission to switch over a read replica, making it the new primary database
